title: The Science of Burning Fat (with Kate the Chemist)
description:
How do you keep the dynamics of your past from dictating your present? And special guest Dr. “Kate the Chemist” Biberdorf talks to us about getting kids interested in math and science.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

From this episode:

KateTheChemist.com, Social: @KateTheChemist

Pre-order “Kate the Chemist, Dragons vs. Unicorns” August 25th
